Plot: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.
Title: 48 Hrs.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
Actors: Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy, Annette O'Toole, Frank McRae
Writer: Roger Spottiswoode, Walter Hill, Larry Gross, Steven E. de Souza
